channel.title: LVS on ox0spy's blog
channel.description: Recent content in LVS on ox0spy's blog

item.title: Setup LVS and Keepalived on Debian
item.description: 准备机器 LVS_MASTER - 172.16.8.129 LVS_BACKUP - 172.16.8.130 WEB_APP_SERVER_1 - 172.16.8.131 WEB_APP_SERVER_2 - 172.16.8.132 注: virtual server: 172.16.8.252 (非真实机器, 只需要在web app server上配下这个IP) 所有机器都安装的Debian 7.5 (wheezy) 安装软件
